content: NEW YORK Plains All American Pipeline LP said on Tuesday it has secured $1.5 billion in new financing from private equity firms  aimed at easing investor fears that the U.S. midstream company would cut shareholder payouts amid slumping crude oil prices.

title: Plains All American raises $1.5 billion from private equity firms  calms investors

content: NEW YORK  Jan 12 Plains All American Pipeline LP  said on Tuesday it has secured $1.5 billion in new financing from private equity firms  aimed at easing investor fears that the U.S. midstream company would cut shareholder payouts amid slumping crude oil prices.
name: Plains All American Pipeline LP
title: Plains All American raises $1.5 bln from private equity firms  calms investors

content: NEW YORK The start up of Plains All American Pipeline's 250 000 barrel-per-day Cactus Pipeline this week  moving crude from the Permian Basin to the U.S. Gulf Coast  will likely prop up Midland differentials  traders say.
name: Plains All American Pipeline LP
title: Plains's Cactus pipeline startup to strengthen Midland differentials

content: HOUSTON  Feb 5 Pipeline company Plains All American LP has U.S. government approval to export minimally processed super-light oil  the latest company to confirm obtaining permission to find markets for condensate that has limited domestic demand.
name: Plains All American Pipeline LP
title: UPDATE 1-Plains All American says has approval to export condensate
